attributes.action: Stop Donald Trump Building on the SSI sites in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Donald Trump proposes to develop a golf course on a SSI site in the UK.
We the undersigned feel that the site being an SSI site is reason enough to stop this development going ahead.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
